channel.title: CVE Feed for StylemixThemes -- uListing (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for StylemixThemes -- uListing (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2021-36879|2024-09-16T16:39:12.254Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Unauthenticated Privilege Escalation vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5). Possible if WordPress configuration allows user registration.

item.title: CVE-2021-36880|2024-09-16T19:36:10.696Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Unauthenticated SQL Injection (SQLi) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.3), vulnerable parameter: custom.

item.title: CVE-2021-36876|2024-09-16T17:18:16.538Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Multiple Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerabilities in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5) as it lacks CSRF checks on plugin administration pages.

item.title: CVE-2021-36878|2024-09-16T18:03:43.270Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5) makes it possible for attackers to update settings.

item.title: CVE-2021-36877|2024-09-16T18:39:01.597Z -- stylemixthemes -- ulisting%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WordPress uListing plugin (versions <= 2.0.5) makes it possible for attackers to modify user roles.
